articles.author: Sara  Moniuszko
articles.title: Obesity rate is declining as more Americans use weight loss drugs, survey finds - CBS News
articles.description: As more Americans turn to weight loss drugs, the U.S. adult obesity rate​ is declining, according to new survey data from Gallup​.
articles.content:
As more Americans turn to weight loss drugs, the U.S. adult obesity rate is declining, according to new survey data from Gallup.
The data published Tuesday showed the obesity rate among participants… [+2509 chars]

articles.author: Josh Boak, Chris Megerian, The Associated Press
articles.title: Trump tells Japan's first woman Prime Minister she has a 'very strong handshake' in Tokyo meeting - Fortune
articles.description: A putter from Shinzo Abe, gold golf balls, and American steak — Takaichi played to Trump’s taste for “golden age” diplomacy in Tokyo.
articles.content: President Donald Trump treated his time in Japan on Tuesday as a victory lap befriending the new Japanese prime minister, taking her with him as he spoke to U.S. troops aboard an aircraft carrier and… [+4939 chars]
